title: so...... what?
body:
People told me that Hextech is for people that don't get items:
- last 2 games I lost with guy with so many items he could give every legend 1 item and used hextech
- people that do get items will still have available hextech in shop
- Jayce counters mele legends
- Vi can ult earlier than Warwick and oneshots him
- the list goes on

replies.body: Let's not forget if you give Jinx the blademaster buff....
Hextech is good regardless of your items

I'm not saying it's bad I'm saying it auto counters oponents items and makes only legends fight with their pure level, ability and combo but you you have the items and enemy doesn't...................
